description.en: This channel provides metadata about the device, including manufacturer details, model information, and operational statuses.
The Air Conditioner device represents a cooling system with additional features for environmental monitoring and energy management.
Controls devices that lower air or liquid temperatures, such as air conditioners or refrigeration systems.
Controls fan devices, including speed, oscillation, and modes for air circulation.
Measures the current temperature in an environment, reported in degrees Celsius.
This channel provides metadata about the device, including manufacturer details, model information, and operational statuses.

Reports real-time power metrics such as voltage, current, and wattage for monitoring and diagnostics.
Manages heating devices, allowing control of temperature settings and modes.
Measures the relative humidity in the environment, reported as a percentage.
Identifies the presence of water or other liquids to detect leaks and prevent damage.

The Camera device represents a surveillance or monitoring system designed for video and image capturing, with additional features for environmental monitoring and interaction.
Provides video and image data streams from surveillance or monitoring cameras. This channel supports configuration and control of camera devices, such as surveillance cameras or babysitting monitors.
